document.title: Appendix E: References
document.abstract: References and photo credits (Appendix E) to The ILR School at Fifty, a collection of reflections on the first fifty years of the School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University.
document.publication-title: The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni and Friends

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation
Appendix E. References. Gruenfeld Goldberg, E. (Ed). McKersie, R., Miller, J. Gormly, Aronson, R., & Julian, R. (Compilers). (1986). The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni & Friends (pp. 263-266). Ithaca, NY: Cornell University. http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/ilratfifty/20/
